channel.title: Black Mesa Desktop Wallpaper
channel.description:
I was wondering if there was anyone here that would be generous enough to make some [i]*new*[/i] dektop wallpapers. The ones I have (including all of the ones from this site) have become somewhat stale, and I'd appreciate something fresh.
Some of you gentlemen and ladies are very talented and have better artistic style than I do. I'm also talking about wallpaper that is something more elaborate than just plastering the logo on a screen shot.
I guess asking for a couple new screens of the game from the devs to make wallpaper from, would be a bit of a stretch. So I guess if it's possible to blend screen shots or trailer scenes or even just the logo on concept art would be cool.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Black Mesa Desktop Wallpaper

item.description:
No. Everyone is now waiting for BMS
